name: upgrade_downgrade_history
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_complete.
Tool description: This API helps you to query stocks, quotes, movers and other financial summary.
API description: Fetches the upgrade and downgrade history for a given stock symbol from the Yahoo Finance Complete API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which the upgrade and downgrade history is to be fetched.

is_from.description: The starting date for the history in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
